description: Detects command line parameters or strings often used by crypto miners
name: Windows Crypto Mining Indicators
query: (process.command_line.text:(*\ \-\-cpu\-priority\=* OR *\-\-donate\-level\=0* OR *\ \-o\ pool.* OR *\ \-\-nicehash* OR *\ \-\-algo\=rx\/0\ * OR *stratum\+tcp\:\/\/* OR *stratum\+udp\:\/\/* OR *LS1kb25hdGUtbGV2ZWw9* OR *0tZG9uYXRlLWxldmVsP* OR *tLWRvbmF0ZS1sZXZlbD* OR *c3RyYXR1bSt0Y3A6Ly* OR *N0cmF0dW0rdGNwOi8v* OR *zdHJhdHVtK3RjcDovL* OR *c3RyYXR1bSt1ZHA6Ly* OR *N0cmF0dW0rdWRwOi8v* OR *zdHJhdHVtK3VkcDovL*) AND (NOT (process.command_line.text:(*\ pool.c\ * OR *\ pool.o\ * OR *gcc\ \-*))))
author: Florian Roth
